summary: The federal government coordinates with states, localities, territories, and Tribes to distribute life-saving medicines and supplies from the Strategic National Stockpile during public health emergencies. But during recent public health responses, such as COVID-19 and mpox, jurisdictions weren't clear on how and from whom to request supplies, causing confusion and delays. Additionally, some Tribal officials cited challenges with having the facilities needed to receive and...
title: Public Health Preparedness: HHS Should Address Strategic National Stockpile Coordination Challenges
